          <title>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Rückflußapparat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'appareillage de reflux</string>

            <string language="en">This illustration shows the setup for carrying-out an organic reaction under reflux.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Installation für das 
Tragen-heraus einer organischen Reaktion unter Rückfluß.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'installation pour 
porter-dehors une réaction organique au reflux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a instalação para 
carregar-para fora uma reação orgânica sob o reflux.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la messa a punto per 
trasportare -fuori una reazione organica al riflusso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την οργάνωση για την 
πραγματοποίηση μιας οργανικής αντίδρασης κάτω από reflux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la disposición para
